effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 17,449 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of Everlasting Fortune

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 4,211 or your lowest secondary stat by 5,313 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,383 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

name: Keeza's 'B.' B.B.B.F.G
description: Every girl needs a *backup* Blazing Ballistic Blunt Force Gun.
